name: Fear_and_Loathing:_on_the_Campaign_Trail_%2772
text:
Fear and Loathing: on the Campaign Trail '72
Fear and Loathing: on the Campaign Trail '72 was a book by Hunter S. Thompson.
A favorite of Hawk, a copy of the book was kept at the Bookhouse.
Behind the scenes
Fear and Loathing: on the Campaign Trail '72 is a 1973 book by Hunter S. Thompson. It chronicles and analyzes the 1972 United States presidential campaign.
